org.obrel.core

Interface RelationBuilder<R extends RelationBuilder<R>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.property.Fluent<R>, FluentRelatable<R>, Relatable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Params

    public interface RelationBuilder<R extends RelationBuilder<R>>
extends FluentRelatable<R>
    An interface for Relatable implementations that provides default methods for classes that need builder pattern relation setting methods. The with(...) methods invoke the method Relatable.set(RelationType, Object) but return the instance of the interface implementation (i.e. the target object of the with() call). This allows to concatenate multiple such calls to build a relatable object that contains different relation with a single invocation. The generic type of an implementation must be the implementation itself, similar to self-referencing enums.

    • Method Detail

      • annotate

        default <T> R annotate(RelationType<?> rType,
                       RelationType<T> rAnnotationType,
                       T rValue)
        A builder pattern method to annotate a relation. Queries the relation with the first type (which must exist) and annotates it with the second type and the given value.
        Parameters:
        rType - The type of the relation to annotate
        rAnnotationType - The relation type of the annotation
        rValue - The value to annotate the relation with
        Returns:
        This instance for concatenation

      • with

        default R with(RelationData<?>... rRelations)
        Invokes Relatable.set(RelationData...) and returns this instance.
        Parameters:
        rRelations - The relations to set
        Returns:
        This instance for concatenation
